description: pystuck.py is a utility for analying stuck python programs (or just hardcore debugging).in order to debug a python program (hence, the debugee),add this line anywhere at startup import pystuck pystuck.run_server().this script is the client, once invoked it connects to the debuggeeand prints the debugees threads stack traces (good for most cases).in addition, it opens an ipython prompt with an rpyc connection that providesaccess to the debuggees modules (good for inspecting variables).
longdescription: pystuck.py is a utility for analying stuck python programs (or just hardcore debugging).in order to debug a python program (hence, the debugee),add this line anywhere at startup import pystuck pystuck.run_server().this script is the client, once invoked it connects to the debuggeeand prints the debugees threads stack traces (good for most cases).in addition, it opens an ipython prompt with an rpyc connection that providesaccess to the debuggees modules (good for inspecting variables).
